job.title: Site Reliability Engineer II
job.industry: Computer Software,Information Technology and Services,Leisure, Travel & Tourism
job.description: As a Site Reliability Engineer II you are involved in all aspects of software development, including participating in technical designs, implementation, functional analysis, and release for mid-to-large sized projects. Your primary focus is on the reliability of the apps and systems that power the world's largest online travel platform.If you have a hunger to make a difference with one of the most loved consumer brands in the world and to work in the dynamic travel industry, this is the job for you.What Youâll DoYou will develop, design, debug, and modify components of software applications and toolsWrite automated unit, integration and acceptance tests as appropriate to support our continuous integration pipelineSupport and troubleshoot data and/or system issues as neededPrototype creative solutions quickly by developing minimum viable products and work with seniors and peers in crafting and implementing the technical vision of the teamCommunicate and work effectively with geographically distributed multi-functional teamsParticipate in code reviews to assess overall code quality and flexibilityResolve problems and roadblocks as they occur with peers and unblock junior members of the team. Follow through on details and drive issues to closureDefine, develop and maintain artifacts like technical design or partner documentationDrive for continuous improvement in software and development process within an agile development teamParticipate in user story creation in partnership with the team(s)Who You AreBachelors or masterâs degree in computer science or related field; or equivalent related professional experience1-3+ yearsâ experience in Software EngineeringExperience using code versioning tools for e.g Git or othersExperience in Agile/Scrum software development practicesEffective interpersonal and intrapersonal skills with the ability to present complex technical information clearly and conciselyDemonstrated commitment to reliability engineering, particularly related to cloud-based systems (AWS preferred)About Expedia GroupExpedia Group (NASDAQ: EXPE) powers travel for everyone, everywhere through our global platform. Driven by the core belief that travel is a force for good, we help people experience the world in new ways and build lasting connections.
